text: 4.17 Sng 22.21, Dan 6.22, Apo 23.11, 27.23, 2 Pi 2.9 Yɨp kot gɨlak anɨb ak pen, Bɨawl ne yɨp kod mɨdɨl kɨles ñak. Ñaknɨŋ, yad binɨb Juda mel kuŋay yɨbɨl ap yelak okok, kɨlop takaw teplep mɨdupsek agñɨjunek nɨgɨlak. Pen Bɨawl ne yɨp dɨl kod mɨdɨlɨg takaw yad agɨl, takaw kɨlop taw jɨsɨpuk gɨnek. Gen, kɨli yɨp ma agyokel, chen layon ladek ak yɨp ma su ñɨŋɨlak.
